rev.comment: /* The PageRank system */ See [[Google bomb]] and [[Spamdexing]].
rev.diff:
Line 123: Line 123:
===The PageRank system===
===The PageRank system===
â
Google's central PageRank system has been criticized, some calling it "undemocratic". Common arguments are that the system is unfairly biased towards large web sites, and that the criteria for a page's importance are not subject to [[peer review]]. The system is also highly susceptible to manipulation and fraud through the use of dummy sites. See [[Google bomb]].
+
Google's central PageRank system has been criticized, some calling it "undemocratic". Common arguments are that the system is unfairly biased towards large web sites, and that the criteria for a page's importance are not subject to [[peer review]]. The system is also highly susceptible to manipulation and fraud through the use of dummy sites. See [[Google bomb]] and [[Spamdexing]].
==Google Offers Wikimedia Hosting==
==Google Offers Wikimedia Hosting==
